reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress classy and well-made, with thick fabric that feels expensive.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Love this dress! The material is not real heavy so I don’t expect it to be exceptionally warm however, the lighter fabric let the dress skim my cures and is very flattering to my wider hips. The color is I expected. The only negative is the waist seem a little high but I am a little long waisted. Nice dress and will be wearing it to a November wedding. Read more
items.author: Rebecca Diann Kern

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Sweater Dress
items.body: Cute and nicely made sweater dress. I am 5’7” and weigh 135 lbs., and the medium fit me well. I wore it to an event on a very cold winter evening and it was perfect! Read more
items.author: Mrs Angela B.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Elegant look
items.body: Love this dress. I'm wearing it for a wedding. Fits perfectly for my body shape. Read more
items.author: Maggy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress. Recommend!
items.body: Very nice quality sweater dress. Very comfortable. The buttons done the front dress give it a dressed up look. I just wore earrings and a gold watch and it didn't even need more jewelry. Black sheer nylons and black sling back closed toe kitten heels and I was ready. I'm 4"11 -5 0". About 118 - 120 lbs. I didn't want a mini dress but I knew that I'm so short it would be longer on me. It was the perfect length, right above the knee. Perfect for the event. Funeral. I was able to take the dress out of the plastic bag, hang it up, and wear the next day. No wrinkles. Amazon is making me so spoiled but I love it! I haven't tried washing it but I suppose when that day arrives it will be in the washer on delicate with delicate laundry cleaner. Tumble dry delicate. If it doesn't survive its OK. The dress didn't break the bank. I recommend this dress. Ps I'm pear shaped and felt it fit my body shape. Read more
items.author: Cathy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again! Nice dress!
items.body: Good quality, nice material, comfortable, sized correctly, wrinkle resistant Read more
items.author: Verna

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Buy a size smaller
items.body: It’s a smart looking dress but it’s larger than usual sizing, being especially bulky in the shoulders and bust. I’m large busted (38D) and the XL was huge on me— the top was swimming on me. The color is great and the fabric and buttons are high quality. It’s very comfortable but the sleeves are too long and I have to were them pushed up. Overall, the top is disproportionately to big. Read more
items.author: Piper Winifred

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great work dress!
items.body: Great work dress! Received numerous compliments. 5’8” and usually wear a size 6, ordered a small and it fits as pictured. Length is also work appropriate. Material is heavier and will be great for fall or with boots in the winter. Ordered the black dress, very classy looking. Read more
items.author: Runmomto4

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality
items.body: This dress is very good quality. I am 5'2" and the medium comes to an inch above the knee. The knit is nice and thick but not too thick. This dress is perfect for the office. Read more
items.author: Judi Wallace

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sand, Blue, Lightblue, Burnt Orange, Apricot, Black, Coffee Brown, Dark Green, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, Ivory, Striped Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
